response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value and relevance to your needs, and I believe it would significantly contribute to your success and growth. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is designed to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I trust that you will find this proposition compelling and look forward to discussing its potential impact on your endeavors.", "product_price": 950000}
